name: Safe Distance Sq.
description:
A new virus got in town. People hate it so much that the city went in lockdown, lets the virus might enjoy itself.

Help people keep a safe distance, avoid spreading the virus by altering the intended path of the few locals that have to go outside.

With levels of increasing difficulty you will learn the habits of the different characters and how to draw them to safety. 

With this game, we want to show how much trust and collaboration help in a situation like the one we're facing right now. Keep on doing your part and be a good example for others. 

Game made for #StaySafeJam

Keep safe distance and wash your hand!
